decision_conditions: The details hereby approved require that the electric vehicle charging points and cycle storage shall be installed in accordance with the approved details (Drawing PC01) and made available for use prior to the commencement of the use hereby permitted and thereafter they shall be permanently retained and maintained.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3a (EV Charging) and 3b (Cycle Storage) of planning permission ref. 30021/APP/2023/554, dated 21-04-2023 (Change of use from a single dwelling house (Class C3) into a children's home for up to three children (C2 Use Class), new replacement doors and windows and installation of an external ramp.)
